mapper.insert: insert into trade_review values( seq_trade_review_no.nextval, 98, #{starScore}, #{content}, default, null)
mapper.update: update trade_review set star_score = #{starScore}, content = #{content}, updated_at = sysdate where review_no = #{reviewNo}
mapper.select: select t.*, m.nickname from trade_review t left join used_product u on(t.product_no = u.product_no) left join member m on(u.buyer_id = m.member_id) where u.seller_id = #{memberId} order by t.created_at desc
select count(*) from trade_review t left join used_product u on(t.product_no = u.product_no) where u.seller_id = #{memberId}

select round(avg(case when u.seller_id = #{memberId} then t.star_score end), 1) star_score_avg, count(case when u.seller_id = #{memberId} then 1 end) product_count, count(case when u.seller_id = #{memberId} and t.review_no is not null then 1 end) review_count from used_product u left join trade_review t on(u.product_no = t.product_no)
